body.p: After editing one or several lookup tables in Data Refinery UI and saving the changes, the lookup configuration can be published by running CG Configuration Node in publish mode. Note that all the lookup tables will always be published at the same time.

ol.li: In Data Refinery UI, open the Configuration stream.
Select the CG Configuration Node that is named PUBLISH_CONFIGURATION.
Click Execute now, then verify with Execute.

body.p: CG Configuration Node has now been run in publish mode and the latest configuration has been loaded into the database.
